name: comet-js-sdk
description: The SDK for usage with a Comet Backup Comet Server

scripts.build:browser: esbuild browser-entrypoint.ts --sourcemap --bundle --target=chrome58,firefox57,safari11,edge16 > dist/comet.js && esbuild browser-entrypoint.ts --minify --bundle --target=chrome58,firefox57,safari11,edge16 > dist/comet.min.js
scripts.build: tsc -b tsconfig.esm.json tsconfig.cjs.json && sh fixup.sh && npm run build:browser

author: Comet Backup
